request_handler.req_description_message: Could you please briefly describe your problem
request_handler.req_user_data_message:
Could you please provide your full name and contact details in one message (phone or e-mail). 
For example: Ivanov Ivan +79999999999 ivanov.i@esil.kz
request_handler.req_building_message: Please provide the address of the building you need help with
request_handler.req_place_message: Please enter the number of the room in which you need assistance
request_handler.created_req_message:
Request %s has been processed, please use the bot menu again to submit another request
If you still have questions, write to Telegram @andrewlemeshev123 or WhatsApp +77476104485

register_user.invalid_iin: Invalid IIN, could you send it again
register_user.user_not_found: I can't find you in the system. Are you an applicant and want to enter ESIL University?
register_user.could_not_find_phone: Your phone number is not set in the platonus database, could you contact the university staff to add the phone number
register_user.sending_sms: An SMS with a code will be sent to your number %s soon, could you please enter this code below
register_user.sms_code_incorrect: Incorrect SMS code entered. Please try again
register_user.sms_code_incorrect_attempts: Incorrect code entered several times. Returning to the main menu
register_user.registration_success: You have successfully passed verification! Hello %s
register_user.sms_service_error: SMS service error, please contact office 125

start_handler.initial_message:
You are welcomed by the information bot assistant of ESIL University. 
So far, I only know how to accept IT applications on the command "Register request" 
I'll be glad to help!
